title: Ushabti of Pedenit
description:
Faience Ushabti of Padyneith, major domo of the divine adoratrice. Mummiform, stands on base with plinth. Has incised wig cover and up turned, braided beard. Holds tools and sack.

Condition: Intact. Glaze weathered fairly evenly from original green. Some incrustation on feet and wig. 

One of group 37.168E-37.171E
dimensions: height: 5 13/16 in. (14.8 cm); width: 1 11/16 in. (4.3 cm); depth of base: 1 1/4 in. (3.2 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
